perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS, Women.com maintains sites on the Internet, currently located
at http://www.women.com (the "Women.com Sites"), that provides an on-line portal
for women, blending content, community, commerce and services;
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS, Women.com maintains digital properties on the Internet, currently located
at http://www.women.com (the "Women.com Sites"), that provides an on-line portal
for women, blending content, community, commerce and services;
perturbation.explanation: The term 'sites' has been replaced with 'digital properties.' While seemingly similar, 'digital properties' is a broader term that could encompass other online assets beyond websites, potentially leading to disputes about the scope of the agreement's application.

perturbation.original_text:
1.1 Women.com will name an area, in which eDiets content will be
published (such area, the "Diet Center"). Links (presented as Diet Center logos)
to the Diet Center will be located on three Women.com channels (the Fitness
Channel www.women.com/fitness; the Health Channel www.women.com/health; and the
Food Channel www.women.com/food) and two subchannels within such channels to be
determined in accordance with Exhibit B hereto.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.1 Women.com will name a zone, in which eDiets content will be
published (such area, the "Diet Center"). Links (presented as Diet Center logos)
to the Diet Center will be located on three Women.com channels (the Fitness
Channel www.women.com/fitness; the Health Channel www.women.com/health; and the
Food Channel www.women.com/food) and two subchannels within such channels to be
determined in accordance with Exhibit B hereto.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'area' has been replaced with 'zone.' While both refer to a region, 'zone' can imply more specific restrictions or functionalities than 'area.' This could create uncertainty regarding the intended use and control of the Diet Center space.

perturbation.original_text:
8.1 eDiets Content. Nothing in this Agreement shall effect a transfer
of ownership in the eDiets Content from eDiets to Women.com, and eDiets shall
retain all rights of copyright, trademark or other intellectual property rights
in such eDiets Content that it possessed prior to providing such eDiets Content
to Women.com, subject only to the licenses expressly granted by eDiets to
Women.com by this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.1 eDiets Material. Nothing in this Agreement shall effect a transfer
of ownership in the eDiets Content from eDiets to Women.com, and eDiets shall
retain all rights of copyright, trademark or other intellectual property rights
in such eDiets Content that it possessed prior to providing such eDiets Content
to Women.com, subject only to the licenses expressly granted by eDiets to
Women.com by this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Content' has been replaced with 'Material'. Although both are related, the change can be used to later claim that only the specific data sent and marked as 'Content' is covered by the agreement, where 'Material' is a broader term.
